summary: Apply any visual effect on player, using the FormID.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This mod allows you to attach "Visual Effects" - RFCT, "Effect Shaders" - EFSH and "Art Objects" - ARTO to player using lesser power "Apply Visual Effect".
You get the power at start, there is no Spell Tome or something similar.

When you use this power, you can enter FormID of effect, view the list of applied effects and clear them all.

If you enter FormID of RFCT or EFSH you can select the power of effect.
If you enter FormID of ARTO you can select one of 5 slots to put the effect in.
Then the effect just applies.

Misc: some of RFCT are made for two objects. In this mod one of them is always player, you can choose the second just by looking on it while casting ( I've used SKSE function Game.GetCurrentCrosshairRef() ).[/size]
author: Meridiano

files.name: Apply Visual Effect
files.changelogHtml: 1.0 was a raw release, only for testing and not for NexusMods. So 1.1 is the first original release.
